siteTitle: JungleCode - Navigate Japan's Healthcare Market with Confidence

hero.title: Transform Healthcare in Japan. Start Here.
hero.subtitle: Enter Asia's $400B+ healthcare market with the expertise to navigate PMDA regulations, build provider trust, and deliver lasting patient impact in Japan's medical ecosystem.

about.title: You Bring the Healthcare Innovation. We Navigate Japan's Medical Landscape.
about.description: JungleCode is your catalyst for healthcare success in Japan — a trusted broker, localization expert, and regulatory strategist. We bridge your innovations with Japan's urgent healthcare transformation needs. Our strength comes from combining deep technical expertise with decades of experience in PMDA navigation, clinical workflows, and cultural fluency. We don’t just translate. We adapt your solution for Japan’s unique ecosystem to ensure clinical resonance and commercial viability.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To accelerate the adoption of transformative healthcare technologies in Japan — improving patient outcomes while navigating innovation, regulation, and culture with precision and care.

keyPoints.title: Healthcare Ecosystem Expertise
keyPoints.description: We understand Japan's healthcare system — from PMDA pathways to hospital hierarchies — and guide your technology to successful clinical adoption and reimbursement.

keyPoints.title: Regulatory Navigation
keyPoints.description: From device classification to Shonin approval and NHI reimbursement, we bring clarity to complex processes and shorten your path to market.

keyPoints.title: Provider Relationships
keyPoints.description: We connect you with hospitals, KOLs, and decision-makers who can champion your solution in Japan’s consensus-driven healthcare system.

challenges.title: Healthcare Market Challenges We Navigate
challenges.intro: Japan's healthcare market is complex — from PMDA requirements to conservative provider culture and strict data laws. We guide you through each challenge with proven strategies and established clinical relationships.

challenges.title: PMDA Approval Process
challenges.challenge: Device classification, Shonin approval, and clinical trial requirements are complex, costly, and can take years.
challenges.solution: We map optimal pathways, facilitate PMDA consultations, use expedited tracks where possible, and accelerate approvals with strong evidence planning.

challenges.title: Data Privacy & Security
challenges.challenge: Japan's Personal Information Protection Act and medical data rules are among the strictest worldwide.
challenges.solution: We ensure compliance, implement robust security, and protect patient privacy while keeping workflows efficient.

challenges.title: Risk-Averse Medical Culture
challenges.challenge: Providers require local evidence, peer consensus, and trusted introductions before adopting new technologies.
challenges.solution: We build credibility through KOL engagement, generate Japanese clinical evidence, and navigate decision-making with cultural sensitivity.

challenges.title: Hospital System Integration
challenges.challenge: Hospital IT systems and EMRs in Japan have unique specifications.
challenges.solution: We adapt your solution for seamless EMR integration, align with workflows, and provide ongoing technical support.

challenges.title: NHI Coverage Requirements
challenges.challenge: National Health Insurance demands proof of cost-effectiveness, clinical superiority, or efficiency gains.
challenges.solution: We build strong health economics arguments, guide Chuikyo negotiations, and position your product for reimbursement.

challenges.title: Sustainable Pricing
challenges.challenge: Balancing innovation value with cost-containment pressures and biennial price cuts is difficult.
challenges.solution: We design pricing strategies that capture value early while planning for long-term sustainability.

services.title: Healthcare Market Entry Services
services.subtitle: From PMDA approval to hospital adoption and reimbursement, we guide every step of your Japan healthcare market entry.

steps.title: Market Entry Planning
steps.description: We design strategies for clinical validation, provider engagement, submissions, and reimbursement positioning.

steps.title: Implementation & Pilot Programs

steps.description: We expand adoption, optimize reimbursement, and establish sustainable operations nationwide.

whyJapan.title: Why Japan is the Global Proving Ground
whyJapan.intro: Japan’s super-aged society and workforce shortage make it the most urgent testbed for next-generation healthcare. With government backing and strong clinical demand, the market is ready for proven innovation.

sections.title: Market Dynamics
items: Society 5.0 investing trillions of yen in digital health

sections.title: Strategic Advantages
items: Government mandate for digital health and AI adoption
PMDA’s Sakigake fast-track for breakthrough devices
Culture of precision aligning with medical standards

sections.title: Success Factors
items: Evidence-based medicine culture requiring strong local data
Long-term trust and relationships drive adoption
Strict safety standards align with compliance needs
Premium positioning for solutions with clear outcomes

footer.tagline: Your catalyst for healthcare innovation in Japan.

team.name: Jet Villegas
team.bio: A builder, operator, and investor with 25+ years in global technology and healthcare. Jet has led engineering operations in Tokyo and San Francisco, bridging cutting-edge medical AI with Japan's strict regulatory environment. His expertise spans healthcare software, device localization, and clinical workflow integration. At JungleCode, he leverages deep ties with hospitals and regulators to help US and European companies succeed in Japan. His mission: advance patient care through technology that truly fits Japan’s ecosystem.

team.name: Aditya Pandya
team.bio: A product leader with 15+ years in digital platforms and 5+ years in Japan. While in Tokyo, he scaled platforms reaching 100M+ users and navigated Japan’s regulatory and cultural complexities. His career spans healthcare-adjacent technologies and data-intensive platforms with strict privacy and safety requirements. At JungleCode, Aditya focuses on adapting healthcare innovations for Japan’s reimbursement systems while ensuring clinical efficacy, patient safety, and sustainable commercial success.
